Mod.Msg: Thanks for installing PornEmpire! If you find any bugs, please report on F95 or Discord. Thanks. - NickNo

Mod.Name: NickNo's NPC Manager
Mod.Description: Manage NPCs, Relatives, Relationships etc. Use with care!

Mod.Name: NickNo's Home Extensions
Mod.Description: Add more rooms and life to your home.

Mod.Name: NickNo's Gangs of LifePlay: Kingpin
Mod.Description: You are the boss. The crime boss!

Mod.Name: NickNo's Home Extensions [Remake Only]
Mod.Description: Add more rooms and life to your home.

Mod.Name: r8kie's Additional Scenes
Mod.Description: Add additional scenes during all type of activities.

Mod.Name: VinnyB's Better Breakups
Mod.Description: Adds and modifies some events so that NPC breakups happen with or without you.

Mod.Name: n1ck's character presets
Mod.Description: 13 male and female characters and 44 presets

Mod.Name: Grim Dresser module
Mod.Description: Allows you to dress NPCs in clothes you select

Mod.Name: Grim Home Assignment module
Mod.Description: Adds an Assign Home action to the PC menu which allows you to assign homes to NPCs

Mod.Name: Grim Re-Dresser module
Mod.Description: A utility mod that allows you to force companions to change their clothes by clicking on them and selecting Re-dress in the interaction menu.
